scroll-to-error.description: Whether to scroll to the failed form item when the validation fails, the optional value is start end
scroll-to-error.description_zh: 验证失败时是否滚动到失败的表单项，可选值为 start end

scroll-to-error-offset-y.description: Scroll to the position offset of the form item that fails validation
scroll-to-error-offset-y.description_zh: 滚动到未通过验证的表单项的位置偏移量

events.name: submit
events.description: Triggered when the form is submitted
events.params: valid: boolean Whether to pass the form verification

events.name: reset
events.description: Fired when the form is reset

methods.name: validate
methods.description: Trigger validation for all form components
methods.description_zh: 所有表单组件的触发器验证

methods.name: resetValidation
methods.description: Clear the validation messages for all form components
methods.description_zh: 清除所有表单组件的验证消息

methods.name: reset
methods.description: Clear all form component bindings of values and validation messages
methods.description_zh: 清除值和验证消息的所有表单组件绑定
